title: Sound On: Trump vs. DOJ And the Hunt for Earth-bound Asteroids
itunes:title: Sound On: Trump vs. DOJ And the Hunt for Earth-bound Asteroids
description:
Bloomberg Government reporter Jack Fitzpatrick delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.

He speaks with Bloomberg legal reporter Erik Larson about a federal judge in Florida saying the Mar-a-Lago search affidavit should be partly unsealed.  Plus, Former commander of the International Space Station, Leroy Chiao, discusses the hunt for Earth-bound asteroids and Rep. Chip Roy talks about the Freedom Caucus and their plans should Republicans retake the house. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
